dmca.title: hot linking and copywrite issues
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Pet Campbell [mailto:pet@petsgardenblog.com] 
Sent: Monday, February 06, 2006 11:06 AM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: hot linking and copywrite issues

My name is Pet Campbell
and I am the owner of http://www.petsgardenblog.com You are hosting a site
called http://www.cats-by-pat.com, ip  70.84.135.78 they have hotlinked to
images on my site,as well as stolen the following articles written by me and
used without my permission.
http://www.cats-by-pat.com/category/bengal-cat/- 8 articles
http://www.cats-by-pat.com/category/alliance/-2 articles
http://www.cats-by-pat.com/category/blackjack/
http://www.cats-by-pat.com/category/bush/
http://www.cats-by-pat.com/category/canine/-2
http://www.cats-by-pat.com/category/carnival/
I really dont see the need to continue on, as the evidance is very very
clear,I want all of my images as well as articles removed from this site.

Pet Campbell
